body_html:
@angersson I have also confirmed this on Tensorflow 1.4.

The Error:

ValueError: graph_def is invalid at node 'model/inference/Shape': Input tensor 'inputs:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type int32.

A non optimised only frozen graph works fine. Again with a RNN.
body_text:
@angersson I have also confirmed this on Tensorflow 1.4.
The Error:

A non optimised only frozen graph works fine. Again with a RNN.
body:
@angersson I have also confirmed this on Tensorflow 1.4.

The Error:
```
ValueError: graph_def is invalid at node 'model/inference/Shape': Input tensor 'inputs:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type int32.
```

A non optimised only frozen graph works fine. Again with a RNN.
